chara.textHome: Nghahaha!
Today's gonna rock!

Gonna feel that summer electricity
all over my body!
This is the time of year to go WILD!
You're up, huh?
I'm goin' down to the beach now!
I have a swim race to win against Tsuruno!
She's going down!
Tsuruno! You ready?!

Lunch today is "Ultra Super Boomalicious
Niagara Fallin' Noodles"!
Get ready to chow down!

Summer rules 'cause daytime lasts forever!
You can play outside for aaages!
Though it is kind of a shock once fall comes.
Huh?!

We don't gotta tell scary stories
just 'cause it's a summer night...
Hm? Well, ya know...
L-listen, it's not like I'm SCARED!

It's awesome, feelin' the bright sun outside...
like, this is really SUMMER!
Ya know?
But relaxin' in the AC is pretty summery too.

Don'tcha think summer's the perfect time
to go out adventurin' or explorin'?
It is, right?
So come on, let's get out there!

U-uhh, this place is just like it always is,
r-right?

It's not like just 'cause it's summer I feel like
this place is s-s-spooky and full of ghosts,
got it?!
Yeah, bring on the fireworks!

Put down one of the ones that
explodes like a volcano!

Wouldn't it be awesome if you lined up
10 and set 'em all off at once?!
Phew! How was that?!

Four seconds?
I can't make it in three yet...

Ugh, I'll never beat Ayame in a
watermelon-eating contest like this!
Pwaaah!

A big glug of water really
hits the spot in this heat!

Mmm... One cup's not enough!
Yo, mister! Gimme another glass!
It's sooo hooot...
Nope. Can't walk another step today.
Hey! We got any ice-cold juice?
How about the grape ice cream I like?
Watermelon splitting?
Leave it to me! Here I cooome!
To the right? No, the left?
Ugh, whatever!

This is annoying! I'm just gonna
whack whatever's in fronta me!
Blegh, this blows.

Ayame's buggin' me again,
looking for a fight...
I'm busy keepin' cool.
I don't got time to waste on her!
The ocean rules, but the pool's great too!
Either way, I can swim my guts out!

And then I get tired and
take an afternoon nap...
I love it!

I used to always go to those radio exercise
gatherings during summer vacation.

And I was there an hour before it started,
so I'd run around and get really warmed up!
Sparklers are real pretty, but kinda lonely
...if you've only got one!

So I wanna see someone hold a
hundred at once!
Hell, I'll do it!
